name: Tabi
description:
A Unique puzzle game where you carry around a crystal to advance!

Immerse yourself in this low-poly world and spend a couple of hours getting lost in the world of Tabi.

Features include flying around freely to explore the vast lands of Tabi, as well as sparkly environments and atmospheric sound!

Tabi was created as part of my University project, and all content (except for some water FX and particle FX) were created by me using Maya and Unity.
Please visit Tabi's facebook page and my instagram page for more updates and behind the scene images!

Visit this link for other projects I have been working on throughout my degree.

WARNING: Not suitable for low-end PCs or laptops due to a high amount of particles!

November 6 Update: Fixed a particle issue that caused heavy CPU usage.
Added pause function.
